sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The level 4 of translations groups together the translations of packages that are likely to prompt users during the install of one of the optional tasks of tasksel with the default install priority.

This includes the following Debian packages:
samba

sect3.title: Package description
sect3.para: The samba Debian package provides the network services for SMB clients and is part of the optional File server task of tasksel.
It asks, during its installation a few questions to users about the default configuration of the file server.

sect3.title: Files location and access methods
sect3.para: This package is a regular Debian package. The package maintenance team uses a SVN repository.

sect3.title: Updating/Adding translations
sect3.para: Translations should be reported as bugs against the samba package.
